rewards.title: Adventure Complete!
rewards.subtitle: Excellent work, Adventurer. Here are your rewards:

party.title: Party Management
party.empty_hint: Complete adventures to recruit new companions!

companion_fire_knight.name: Fire Knight
companion_fire_knight.description: A brave knight wielding flames. Strikes monsters with burning attacks.

companion_shadow_archer.name: Shadow Archer
companion_shadow_archer.description: Silent and precise. Shoots arrows from the shadows.

companion_lightning_mage.name: Lightning Mage
companion_lightning_mage.description: Channels the power of storms. Casts devastating lightning bolts.

companion_frost_ranger.name: Frost Ranger
companion_frost_ranger.description: Master of ice and cold. Freezes monsters with chilling arrows.

companion_crystal_guardian.name: Crystal Guardian
companion_crystal_guardian.description: Protected by crystalline armor. Shields the party from harm.

companion_earth_defender.name: Earth Defender
companion_earth_defender.description: Strong as stone. Raises earthen barriers to block attacks.

companion_light_healer.name: Light Healer
companion_light_healer.description: Blessed with healing magic. Restores the party with radiant light.

companion_nature_druid.name: Nature Druid
companion_nature_druid.description: In harmony with nature. Provides gradual healing and protection.

1.title: The Goblin Forest
1.description: Scouts have reported goblin activity in the nearby woods. Investigate and clear the threat.

2.title: Stone Golem Cave
2.description: A massive golem is blocking the pass. You must defeat it to proceed.

3.title: The Sorcerer's Tower
3.description: The source of the corruption has been found. Defeat the dark sorcerer!
